avalancheActivity.highlights: SW snowfall and strong winds are expected for the weekend that could form windslabs in N-A facing hills.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It snowed in E-winds last week but minor SW snowfall has characterized this week. An intense rainstorm passed on Thursday with a lot of warming but it froze again quickly which likely stabilized the snowpack. A lot of SW snowfall is expected for the weekend that could form windslabs in N-E facing hills.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snowpack widely became isothermal and stable in thaw on Thursday. New unstable wind slabs can form in snow showers and SW snowdrift, especially in South- and West-Iceland.
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snowpack widely became isothermal and stable in thaw on Thursday. New unstable wind slabs can form in snow showers and SW snowdrift, especially in South- and West-Iceland.

weatherForecast.highlights: Viðvarandi SV snjókoma í miklum vind einkennir alla helgina með aukinni ákefð á Sunnudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: Many small avalanches in the forecasting area after E-NE wind and considerebla but temporary snowfall on Thursday.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has been added in mountains. Many small avalanches fell in the area after rapit but considerable snowfall on Thursday. More snow will be added in varibla wind and showers of snow.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Possible older windslabs in SW to NE aspects. A snowprofile was taken in Seljalandsdalur on the 24th. It showed layers of windbroken snow on top of melt/freez snow. CT showed a fracture by light load at 20 cm and at 26 cm by medium load on the boundary between the windbroken snow and melt/freeze snow.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snowpack widely became isothermal and stable in thaw on Thursday. New unstable wind slabs can form in snow showers and SW snowdrift, especially in South- and West-Iceland.
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snowpack widely became isothermal and stable in thaw on Thursday. New unstable wind slabs can form in snow showers and SW snowdrift, especially in South- and West-Iceland.

weatherForecast.highlights: Fremur hægar breytilegar áttir og éljagangur

avalancheActivity.comment: Avalanches have been falling in the region in various facies. Avalanche was reported from Hrafnabjargarhnjúkur in Karlsárdalur last week along with four avalanches in Burstabrekkudalur. In the thawing on Thursday, a small avalanche fell close to the Siglufjarðarvegur road by Landsendi.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Next days there will be minor SW snowfall that could form windslabs in N-A facing hills. It got warm high in the mountains on Thursday before it froze again so the underlying snowpack should widely be stable below 1000 m.

snowpackStructure.highlights: NW snowfall characterized the beginning of the week with snowdrift in SE facing hills. A weakness was discovered in the snowpack that showed faceting in a weak layer. An intense thawing weather on Thursday penetrated the snowpack and it is likely that this weak layer is widely gone below 1000 m altitude. It froze again quickly after the weather so the snowpack got considerably stronger. However, SW snowfall is expected throughout the weekend in high winds in the mountains that could form windslabs in N and E facing hills.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snowpack widely became isothermal and stable in thaw on Thursday. New unstable wind slabs can form in snow showers and SW snowdrift, especially in South- and West-Iceland.
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snowpack widely became isothermal and stable in thaw on Thursday. New unstable wind slabs can form in snow showers and SW snowdrift, especially in South- and West-Iceland.

weatherForecast.highlights: Á föstudag má vænta þess að það frysti á ný eftir hlákuveður. Lítilsháttar SV éljagangur einkennir helgina með aukinni ákefð á Sunnudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: Sluffs after warm temperatures on Thursday
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has become isothermal after warm temp and rain on Thursday, but dry snow could exist high in mountains where the warming has not affected the snow. Windslabs can form in N-E facing aspects the next days.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Before there were windslabs on top of hard snow with facets between. In warm weather and rain alot of snow melted and what is left has mostly become isothermal. Windslabs and facets may possibly exist high in mountains where the warmth did not affect the snow as much. Frost the next days and occatonal showers of snow and windslabs may form in N-E facing aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snowpack widely became isothermal and stable in thaw on Thursday. New unstable wind slabs can form in snow showers and SW snowdrift, especially in South- and West-Iceland.
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snowpack widely became isothermal and stable in thaw on Thursday. New unstable wind slabs can form in snow showers and SW snowdrift, especially in South- and West-Iceland.

weatherForecast.highlights: Frost næstu daga, S-V lægar áttir éljabakkar á köfflum. Lægðardrag væntanlegt á sunnudag
